name: KRYPE
description:
Defend the world from the invasion of Krype!

How to play:

Fire your laser at the incoming enemies by interacting with the control panel at the top of your ship. Feed the Blob to gain health and more power. The cucumbers can be fed as they are, or you can ferment them first for an extra bonus.

WASD - Run

SPACEBAR - Jump

E - Pick up and drop items, interact
